name: Art-Therapy: Portraits
description:
Do you love puzzles and art? Then you will enjoy this relaxing casual game that challenges your brain and soothes your eyes.

Solve 100 levels of beautiful portraits by dragging and dropping pieces into the right places. Discover different styles and themes of painting as you progress through the game. Whether you want to relax after a long day or test your skills in a short break, this game is perfect for you. Download it now and enjoy the art of puzzle solving!
